name: Fireman (Nifty Llama Games)
description:
Fireman is a game where you, the hero, fight yourself through a burning house with only a small bucket to help you save all the victims in said house. Saving them will get you money to unlock better equipment and new level.

This game was created in 5 Days during the BlenderGameMakingChallenge17 by otto001 and Leander Burger

Theme: Water

All assets created during the Jam
